articles.content:
WPK Delegation Comes Back
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) ? The delegation of the Workersâ€™ Party of Korea headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., WPK, came back on Wednesday after wrapping up its visit to Laos, Vietnam and Myanmar.

articles.title: Modern Changjoin Street in Pyongyang Completed
articles.content:
Changjon Street Construction in Pyongyang Completed
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) --The construction of Changjon Street in Pyongyang has been successfully completed.
					 The street stretches along the bank of the River Taedong from Mansu Hill where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand. There are in the street the People's Theatre, skyscrapers and multi-storied apartment houses and various welfare and service facilities. All of them were put on the basis of formative art and they are enclosed in a beautiful park. 
					
					 The Mansudae area has all elements of architectural style and the layout of the street. Service personnel and other people of the DPRK successfully built this street in a matter of one year.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the street construction took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials and members of the Cabinet, officials in construction units, builders and Pyongyangites who are expected to move to new flats.
					
					 Read out at the ceremony was a joint congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK National Defence Commission to service personnel of the Korean People's Army, builders of the capital city, shock brigaders and helpers who performed shinning labor feats in building the street.
					
					 The message said that all the builders of Changjon Street who devoted all their energies and wisdom to the gigantic project for materializing the WPK's grandiose plan for capital construction are, indeed, standard-bearers in building a thriving nation, heroes in the era of Songun and genuine patriots.
					
					 It noted with high appreciation that all of them successfully implemented the behests of leader Kim Jong Il by dedicating all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the project with intense loyalty to their party and leader and strong sense of moral obligation.
					
					 DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his address at the ceremony that the builders of Changjon Street completed the construction of modern buildings and thus put into practice leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble patriotism and high intention of their love for the people, adding that these heroic feats would go down in the country's history along with a thriving nation.
					
					 He also called upon the builders and officials to further glorify the heyday of Pyongyang in the era of Songun through their energetic effort to turn it into a more magnificent and fashionable world class city.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, leading party, state and army officials looked round apartment houses in the street.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Followers' Anti-DPRK Sanctions Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Followers' Anti-DPRK Sanctions Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea Wednesday issued a memorandum disclosing the truth about the U.S. and its followers' sanctions against the DPRK and their harsh and despicable nature. 
					 According to it, the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War on June 25, 1950 and on Dec. 17 of the same year labeled the DPRK as "a hostile country threatening the U.S. security." It severed all economic relations with the DPRK including freezing of its assets, stop to trade and investment, financial transaction and transport, pursuant to the "Trading with the Enemy Act". 
					
					 In the 1960s with the "Foreign Aid Act" in force the U.S. totally barred the government, business groups and banks from dealing with the DPRK. In the 1970s and 1980s it escalated sanctions against the DPRK in all fields of economy such as trade, investment, insurance, credit, loan and lease on the strength of the Trade Act, the "Foreign Economic Emergency Measure Act" and the "Export and Import Bank Act". 
					
					 On Jan. 20, 1988 the U.S. groundlessly labeled the DPRK as "a sponsor of terrorism" and invoked all sanction acts including the "Foreign Aid Act", the "Arms Export Control Act" and the "International Banking Organs Act". 
					
					 According to the Geneva DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework in October 1994 the U.S. promised to provide light water reactors to the DPRK. But, it dragged on the project and finally stopped it, laying big obstacles to the DPRK's development of self-supporting nuclear energy industry. 
					
					 The U.S. and its followers cooked up anti-DPRK resolutions 1718 and 1874 at the UN Security Council meetings in 2006 and 2009, groundlessly pulling up it over its nuclear test for self-defence and launches of satellites for peaceful purposes, slapping new harsh sanctions on it worldwide. 
					
					 In April this year they cooked up the UNSC presidential statement "critical" of the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-3, kicking off an anti-DPRK campaign calling for additional sanctions. 
					
					 The sanctions imposed by the U.S. and its followers upon the DPRK involve not only the military field but almost all other fields. Restrictions and embargo are imposed upon all things ranging from materials necessary for people's living to delivery of major industrial   equipment and the transfer of latest technology. 
					
					 Pursuant to domestic acts and UN resolutions, etc. the U.S. is enforcing the freeze of the DPRK's assets, bans on aid, financial transaction and assistance, loan contracts, search operations against suspicious ships in the open seas, confiscation of banned materials and control over all the exports and imports of materials related to all types of weapons. 
					
					 There are more than hundreds of acts and measures of the U.S. for applying sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					 They are slapping double and treble sanctions upon the DPRK through the "Wassenaar Arrangement on Export Controls for Conventional Arms and Dual-use Goods and Technologies," etc. 
					
					 To cite just an example, the U.S. prevented other countries from exporting raw Vanadium to the DPRK in 2009, on the plea that it might be used for missile production. 
					
					 There are thousands of materials and technologies on which embargo is put like this. 
					
					 They enforce an embargo on equipment for chemical industry under the pretext that they may be diverted to dual-use and are controlling even the delivery of raw materials for cosmetics, claiming that they may be used for the production of chemical weapons. They are banning the export of long-bed vehicles to the DPRK by this or that way under the pretext that they may be used as carriers or launchers of missiles.
					
					 As far as humanitarian aid is concerned, they block it, talking about "dismantlement of nukes" and "transparency." They have become so mean as to claim rice should not be provided to the DPRK as it may be diverted to military use and it is advisable to provide only confectionery or nutrients that cannot be kept for a long time and even in that case they should be given little by little every month. 
					
					 Noting that the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is most zealous in executing the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK, the memorandum goes on: 
					
					 In July 2008 the Lee group of traitors unilaterally derailed the tour of Mt. Kumgang which had been conducted for nearly 10 years, driving the work in the Kaesong industrial zone to an extreme crisis. 
					
					 It was more desperate in the moves to cook up UNSC resolutions on sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					 Even at present the Lee group is busy with diplomacy intended to implore other countries to refrain from investing, giving humanitarian aid and having any deal with the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group are sadly mistaken if they think such mean sanctions would help shake the faith and will of the Korean people and break the single-minded unity. 
					
					 Neither sanctions nor pressures can hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.

articles.title: Vice-chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Tours Different Places
articles.content:
Vice-chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Tours Different Places
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), visited an ostrich farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang on June 20.
					 He looked round several places including the ostrich pens built in a row and meat-processing plant.
					
					 He expressed deep admiration, looking across the neat and cultural production buildings and the farm which has turned into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 He also visited the mock-up location streets and appreciated a performance of the National Symphony Orchestra and light comedy "An Echo among the Hills".

articles.title: Chinese Audience Praise Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Geniuses of Arts
articles.content:
Chinese Audience Praise Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Geniuses of Arts 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The performance of the revolutionary opera of the DPRK "The Flower Girl" is going on before full house in China every day.
					 When the opera was staged at an international conference center in Xi' an city, Shaanxi Province, it completely mesmerized the Chinese audience.
					
					They were unsparing in their praises of the opera.
					
					 Wen Yana, general manager of a company, congratulating Korean artistes on their successful performance, said:
					
					 The opera was very splendid. I have never watched such a fascinating opera. Korean arts have reached such a high level.
					
					 Zheng Guangmin, an employee of Xi' an bank, had this to say:
					
					  This revolutionary opera will always be remembered by the Chinese as a masterpiece.
					
					 We extend thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un for sending the art troupe performing the opera to China.
					
					 Tan Zhuzhi working at the Electronics Institutes of Shaanxi Province said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were distinguished great men and geniuses of arts.
					
					 Chen Fangquan, editor of the Shaanxi TV, and other Chinese who enjoyed the opera noted:
					
					 The opera was a perfect combination of the ideological and artistic contents, truthful acting of artistes, graceful and sweet music, fascinating dances and unique stage decor.
					
					 The audience greatly admired the beautiful voices of artistes. Its music was peculiar in its character.
					
					 The melodies of the opera will be always remembered by the Chinese people as famous music.
					
					 The audience could not watch the miserable fate of the family of Kottbun and the scenes of the opera without tears in their eyes

articles.title: Pyongyang Games of Juvenile Sports Schools Held
articles.content:
Games of Pyongyang Juvenile Sports Schools Held
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The 49th Games of Juvenile Sports Schools in Pyongyang took place to fix the winners in the year of 2012 and select city players for the National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools to be opened in August.
					 In this contest, former winning teams took the lead in such events as weightlifting, women's judo, track-and-field, boxing, women's basketball and wrestling. But, results in some events went against expectations of sports experts and fans.
					
					 In the football event divided into four groups, men's and women's teams from primary schools in Phyongchon District won the titles while other six titles went to different teams from six districts or counties.
					
					 Its titles in the past contests had been obtained by football teams from Rangnang District. This district took five titles in the football event in one year.
					
					 Such unexpected results were also made in men's basketball, men's judo and women's volleyball events.
					
					 A sports expert told KCNA that the recent games showed further development of young players in physical fitness and technical skills.
					
					 Those qualified for the national games are now stepping up their training to prove successful in the forthcoming games.

articles.title: Drought Severely Affects Kaesong City in DPRK
articles.content:
Drought Severely Affects Kaesong City in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kaesong City in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is suffering from lingering drought.
					 According to data available, crops in some 1 000 hectares of paddies and over 600 hectares of non-paddy fields were drying up as of June 17.
					
					 Rice seedlings in four hectares withered away in drought. Rice-transplantation was impossible in more than 1 600 hectares, including rain-dependent paddies, for lack of water.
					
					 Hit hardest by drought in the city are Samsong, Haeson, Kaephung and Jonjae co-op farms.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Preventing Land Corrasion
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Preventing Land Corrasion
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has directed big efforts to preventing soil corrasion.
					 A general mobilization movement for land management is launched every year, with all people involved.
					
					 With watershed managed on a proper basis, agro-ecological environment is improved and the safety of communities ensured.
					
					 Kim Kwang Ju, section chief of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Ministry applies agro-forestry management technology to conserve ecosystem.
					
					 It sponsored national seminars on several occasions to arouse public interest in prevention of land corrasion.
					
					 It published a book on agro-forestry management technology while training experts.
					
					 The work for land management enjoys cooperation from international organizations.
					
					 The European Union is cooperating with the DPRK for the rational management of sloping lands.
					
					 The Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) had already given technological cooperation for watershed management in mountains and plains. It is now helping apply land management technology, including the introduction of conservation farming.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK has offered the technology of drawing water in sloping lands.
					
					 The DPRK is a signatory to the UN Convention to Combat Desertification."

articles.title: Independent Politics Pursued by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Independent Politics Pursued by Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- 48 years has passed since leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on June 19, 1964.
					 On this occasion the Korean people recollect the undying feats he performed by leading the Korean revolution along the road of Juche with his steadfast independent politics.
					
					 Independence was the mainstay of Kim Jong Il's politics.
					
					 Strictly based on the principle of independence, Kim Jong Il rejected any foreign interference and pressure and settled all problems in conformity with the nation's interests and the country's actual situation, not subject to any established theory and formula.
					
					 He set forth slogans "Let us live our own way!" and "Let us meet the requirements of Juche in ideology, technology and culture!" whereby he gave guidance to all sectors of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Guided by his independent politics, the DPRK could make long strides while further strengthening its politico-ideological, military and economic might, not affected by the worldwide anti-socialist whirlwind.
					
					 The Korean people have applied the principle of independence in all fields of the revolution and construction to steadily develop Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, thereby fully displaying the dignity, wisdom and stamina of Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Brilliant Commander of Songun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Brilliant Commander of Songun
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made public treatise "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on April 20.
					 In the treatise, he noted that under the banner of Songun (military-first) leader Kim Jong Il protected the dignity and supreme interests of the country and the nation in reliance on powerful arms and glorified the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as an invincible socialist power.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tanks Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Aug. 25, Juche 49 (1960) was a historic event, through which he clarified the idea that the revolution starts, advances and is accomplished by dint of arms.
					
					 He showed his distinguished political and military ability while inspecting many KPA units.
					
					 In the 1990s, Kim Jong Il defined the Songun politics as the basic mode of politics under socialism and pursued it to reliably defend the country and socialism while turning the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 He also strengthened the KPA into the main force of the revolution intensely loyal to the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and achieved the harmonious whole of the Party and the army and the great unity between the servicepersons and the civilians.
					
					 The socialist cause of Juche is sure to be accomplished thanks to the great feats of Kim Jong Il, who gave top priority to the military affairs, trained the KPA to be the standard-bearer of the Songun revolution and led the revolution and construction to victory under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative forces are working hard to muscle "bill on human rights in the north" through the 19th "National Assembly" at any cost,  saying that it is regretful that the 18th NA failed to pass the bill due to the rejection of the opposition parties. Meanwhile, the "Saenuri Party" is kicking up an anti-DPRK farce over the "human rights issue" through a conspiratorial "coloring" offensive, labeling opposition party figures opposed to the "bill" as "forces following the north". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is preposterous for the south Korean "government" authorities to go busy with its moves to enact the "law" though it is branded as a strangler of democracy and the worst abuser of human rights
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in seeking the "law" is to bring down the ideology and the social system in the DPRK under the signboard of "human rights issue" and realize its daydream of "achieving unification of the social systems".
					
					 If the "bill" is railroaded through the NA, this will be little short of an open declaration that the "Saenuri Party" does not recognize the ideology and the social system in the DPRK and it intends to stand in confrontation with it to the last. 
					
					 The north-south relations are in the worst phase of catastrophe. 
					
					 The desperate efforts of the puppet conservative group to enact such "law" under this situation can never be overlooked. 
					
					 It is strong determination of the DPRK not to allow even a bit those who challenge the ideology and the social system in the DPRK which its people consider dearer than their own lives, but mercilessly punish them. 
					
					 The puppet forces would be well advised to stop at once such moves, bearing deep in mind that those moves are as foolish an act as precipitating their doomsday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Decries New Japan Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Decries New Japan Defense Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- New Japanese Defence Minister Morimoto, echoing the U.S., called the peaceful April satellite launch of the DPRK a "missile test".
					 His allegation, Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in a bylined commentary says, is aimed to justify an active hand Japan has given to the establishment of the U.S.-led missile defence system.
					
					 Given that the Japanese reactionaries are massively producing and deploying modern missiles, their act of finding fault with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is just a gimmick aimed at covering up their criminal and aggressive true colors, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The Japanese politicians' deliberate criticism is sheer sophism of those steeped in bitter hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries buoyed by the militaristic zeal had better hold their tongues.
					
					 Their persistent outcries will only disclose the nature of provokers threatening peace and stability in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Wild Ambition for Overseas Expansion Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Wild Ambition for Overseas Expansion Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A three-day joint naval exercise was staged by the U.S., Japan and Australia in the waters southeast of Kyushu Island of Japan recently. Earlier, Japan held defence minister-level talks with Britain in Singapore at which both sides exchanged a memorandum on boosting the bilateral cooperation in defence.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan, keen on joint action, cooperation and exchange with other countries in military field, is working hard to realize them. This is an extremely reckless move to turn Japan into a military giant and realize its wild ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 Japan is talkative about the "changed environment of security" and "new military threat" but this is, in the final analysis, nothing but sheer sophism intended to put the above-said move into practice and seek an opportunity of its overseas aggression.
					
					 It is the sinister scenario of Japan to realize its wild ambition for overseas expansion and reinvasion while staging as many military activities overseas as it pleases through the exercise of the right to collective self-defence in the form of joint military drills. 
					
					 Japan may ignite a war of aggression any time.
					
					 Still fresh in the memory of the international community are the serious wounds inflicted upon it by Japan's war of aggression in the past. It remains highly vigilant against Japan rushing headlong into the moves for the conversion of itself into a military giant and launch of overseas expansion while refusing to reflect on its past acts of aggression.
					
					 Japan had better stop its rash acts, properly understanding the will of the international community not to allow the revival of militarism and reinvasion.

articles.title: S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Hysteria Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Hysteria Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the south Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff, talked about "possibility of military provocations" by the DPRK during his recent inspection of the 1st Fleet Command of the Navy on the east coast and 18th Combat Air Division under the Air Force. He kicked up war hysteria again while crying out for "destruction" and "decisive punishment."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This hysteria is a revelation of sinister intention of Jong to describe the will of the army and people of the DPRK to retaliate against perpetrators of hideous crimes as "possibility of provocations" in a bid to shift the responsibility for tensions running high in the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and thus justify the moves for escalating confrontation and igniting a war against it.
					
					 What matters here is that Jong raised a hue and cry over the "strike at the bases of provocations and even its commanding forces" whenever opportunities presented themselves, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 His outbursts reflect adventurous scenario of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to launch an all-out war following an armed conflict like Yonphyong Island incident according to a doctrine which calls for "striking the bases of provocations and its commanding forces".
					
					 The Lee group is the arch criminal escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula and the very source agitating and spearheading the moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 It admits of no argument that the Korean nation will fall victim to a nuclear war and its territory plunge into its holocaust unless such warmongers are eliminated at an early date.
					
					 The Lee group would face a miserable ruin by the DPRK's sacred war of merciless retaliation. Traitors deserve punishment, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Double-dealing Nature of U.S. Human Rights Offensive
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Double-dealing Nature of U.S. Human Rights Offensive 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- U.S. human rights abuses are sparking off uproar. 
					 As recognized by the international community, the U.S.-led "anti-terror war" is a wanton violation of sovereignty of other countries and illegal genocide and human rights abuses. 
					
					 The wars in Iraq and Afghanistan launched by the former U.S. Administration under the pretext of "routing terrorists" are little different from the secret wars fought by the present U.S. Administration with the help of drones in Pakistan, Yemen, Somalia and others in their criminal nature. 
					
					 U.S. forces are perpetrating bloody genocide in various parts of the world 
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that this is being directly commanded by the U.S. chief executive. 
					
					 The U.S. is the chieftain of human rights abuses as man-killings and human rights abuses are sponsored by the state. 
					
					 By origin, the U.S. was built as a result of horrible massacres. 
					
					 U.S. state monopoly capitalism is based on aggression and plunder of other countries and this inevitably causes such human abuses as genocide. 
					
					 No wonder, the international community says that the U.S. monopolizes "patent" on human rights abuses and it is, therefore, the worst human rights abuser in the world. 
					
					 It is quite natural for the world people to chide and ridicule the U.S. president who received even Nobel Peace Prize for his rhetoric calling for the closure of prisons in Guantanamo. 
					
					 The U.S. had better settle its human rights abuses before talking about human rights records in other countries.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Massively Beefed up
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Massively Beefed up
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The units of U.S. forces present in south Korea were reported by south Korean media on June 18 to have been massively reinforced with latest offensive weapons.
					  According to it, the U.S. forces keep introducing latest ground-to-ground missiles and MLRS into south Korea and deploying them in their units.
					
					 In the meantime, the tanks and armored cars are replaced by new-type ones and motorized troops and reconnaissance equipment are sharply beefed up.

articles.title: KCNA Holds S. Korean Lee Myung Bak Group Accountable for Increasing Danger of War
articles.content:
KCNA Holds S. Korean Lee Myung Bak Group Accountable for Increasing Danger of War
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea, pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackeys, is increasing the danger of a new war on the Korean Peninsula through its reckless military provocations.
					 It was the Lee group that pushed the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase through its racket for confrontation of the social systems and unethical actions. Not content with this, it is getting evermore desperate in this ruckus, taking advantage of the U.S. preparations for a new war. 
					
					 It is busy massively introducing new type destructive equipment and other weapons including the U.S.-made fighters, missiles and bombs, becoming louder in trumpeting about "additional provocations from the north" together with its American master.
					
					 It is also busy verifying and rounding off the capability for an actual war for carrying out the U.S. war scenario aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet warmongers staged a "drill for examining the posture to cope with a local war" under the simulated conditions of "attack on warships, provocative shelling and infiltration into key facilities" in an eastern coastal area and the largest-ever joint aerial combat drill with the U.S.
					
					 They also perpetrated such dangerous military provocation as demonstration of firing of artillery pieces including the MLRS in the forefront area less than 10km away from the north side, while crying out for "punishment" and "precision strike."
					
					 They are putting further spurs to military provocations in June.
					
					 In a week from June 18 to 25 the Lee group plans to stage "Hwarang exercise for 2012", joint naval exercise of the U.S., Japan and south Korea, the U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercise involving a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier and other war maneuvers.
					
					 The above-said military moves cannot be construed otherwise than dangerous developments as they create new tension on the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that traitor Lee Myung Bak is the top class lackey of the U.S. carrying out its policy for stifling the DPRK and the boss of the first line shock brigade serving the U.S. and Japan in their operations to disturb peace and stability in Korea and the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The reckless military hysteria of the Lee group is reminiscent of traitor Syngman Rhee who played the role of a shock brigade when the U.S. ignited the Korean War on June 25, 1950, crying out for "northward march."
					
					 Even the slightest provocation on the peninsula may promptly lead to an all-out nuclear war between both sides and a regional war because it is the region where the world's biggest military forces including nukes are concentrated and there is neither lasting mechanism nor guarantee for averting a war.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group would be well advised to think twice over the grave consequences to be entailed by their moves for a new war.

articles.title: Meeting Held in Seoul to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Seoul to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration was held in Seoul on Saturday under the theme of "Let's defend peace in spirit of June 15!"
					 Ri Kang Sil, permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, at the meeting called for carrying on the dynamic actions till the anti-reunification "government" is brought down and reunification is achieved in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 Pak Tok Sin, representative of the Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, urged the present regime to give up its conservative stance, though belatedly, implement the declaration and exert efforts for national reconciliation, exchange, cooperation and peaceful reunification through fence-mending measures.
					
					 Kim Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea, expressed his will to carry on the actions to the last though the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Saenuri Party" throw a stumbling block in the way of reunification.
					
					 Son Mi Hui, co-representative of the Women's Solidarity of south Korea, renewed her resolution to frustrate through the concerted efforts of the Koreans the moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime to kick up a whirlwind of the past dictatorship through its coloring offensive for "eliminating the forces following the north", not content with the military confrontation, and win victory in the forthcoming "presidential" election at any cost.
					
					 An appeal was read out at the meeting.
					
					 It called for punishing dictators and separatist forces and making a vigorous advance for independence, peace and reunification.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Urged to Take Lead in Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Urged to Take Lead in Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kwak Tong Ui, chairman of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, sent a letter to all overseas Koreans on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. The letter called upon all overseas Koreans to work hard for opening the new phase of peace and reunification in the spirit of "By our nation itself". 
					 The letter recalled that the Koreans have waged a strenuous struggle for national reunification, taking the joint declaration as a great programme and landmark for reunification since the publication of the joint declaration. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations were driven to a serious catastrophe owing to the moves of the south Korean "government" authorities against the June 15 joint declaration, it said, and went on:
					
					 It is an important task on whose fulfillment hinges the destiny of the Korean nation to meet the grave challenges of the anti-reunification forces and bring back the June 15 era. 
					
					 Overseas Koreans' organizations will actively turn out in the struggle to put an end to the confrontation.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held an event in Los Angeles, the U.S. to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The chairman of the U.S. Western Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made a speech at the commemorative ceremony held before the event.
					
					 The declaration adopted 12 years ago helped cut off the vicious cycle of distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and open a new chapter for reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification, he said, charging that Lee Myung Bak of south Korea openly denied the declaration which reflects the nation's desire, thus plunging the inter-Korean relations into a deadlock and sparking off even a military conflict.
					
					 He urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to immediately stop the moves against the June 15 declaration, threatening peace and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Then followed a lecture for reunification.
					
					 The lecturer blamed the stalled implementation of the declaration on the treacherous forces that have taken roots deep in south Korea, kowtowing to outsiders and shunning reconciliation among Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. has resorted to its hostile policy toward the DPRK and backed the south Korean conservative forces to fan up the inter-Korean confrontation. This is the main reason that the implementation of the declaration has suffered hardships, he said.
					
					 He called upon Koreans in the north and the south to pull the U.S. forces out of south Korea and pool their efforts for the implementation of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi paper on June 14 carried the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification."
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and set forth the tasks and ways to accomplish the cause of national reunification on their basis.
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Foreign Organizations' Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Foreign Organizations' Websites
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on June 13 posted on their Internet websites the detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012 clarifies the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the revolution and construction. It recalls that leader Kim Jong Il firmly upheld and protected the idea and cause of the President and wisely led the work to implement them.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks for firmly defending and preserving the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and glorifying them for all ages, etc.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website on June 12 the full text of a congratulatory speech made by Kim Jong Un at a joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations in celebration of the 66th birthday of the KCU. 
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association posted the gist of the speech on its website on June 11.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his speech on June 6 expressed his steadfast will to invariably carry forward Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on future and the younger generation, the Association said, adding:
					
					 He also indicated tasks and ways for bringing up the KCU members as reserve forces, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, who would be responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Italian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Italian Magazine
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The June issue of Italian magazine La Voce carried the full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun".
					 The work, made public on April 15, 2012 clarified that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which proved an immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 The work clarifies the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army guarantees the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea. 
					
					 It indicates tasks for exalting the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully building a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Exploits Performed by Kim Jong Il in Party Building Praised Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries and by a regional organization to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included meetings, lectures, round-table talks and seminars on Kim Jong Il's exploits held in Romania, Guinea, Ethiopia, Myanmar, Peru, Germany and Cambodia between May 29 and June 12.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union gave a detailed account of the fact that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said though Kim Jong Il passed away, his exploits in the party building would last forever along with the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea referred to the single-minded unity of the DPRK cemented by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar said the WPK has always won victories and the DPRK could turn into a dignified political, ideological and military power under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", the organizational secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship said the WPK is a glorious party that holds Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal general secretary and a model of the progressive political parties in the struggle for socialism.
					
					 Osieno Stephen, executive advisor to the general secretary of the Pan-African Movement, praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who protected the dignity and vital interests of the country and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Indonesian Political Personage
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Indonesian Political Personage
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on June 13 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 All the members of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia express full support and solidarity for the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country and achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The joint declaration is an immutable banner of all the Koreans in the north and the south to make a new history for national reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities, however, have totally denied the joint declaration and strained the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension while staging large-scale joint military exercises with the U.S. They should accept the joint declaration and stop at once the act of pushing the inter-Korean relations to an extreme phase.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the south Korean authorities for following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, and fully support the sincere efforts of the DPRK government to improve the inter-Korean ties in line with the joint declaration.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly achieve national reunification, a cherished desire of the nation, in the near future under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Warned to Behave with Discretion: Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Warned to Behave with Discretion: Bangladeshi Personage
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, in a statement on June 13 warned the south Korean authorities to behave with discretion, properly seeing the trend of the times.
					 The celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union were significantly held amid great concern and blessings of all the Korean people and progressive mankind, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 World people also expressed longing and expectation for the future of thriving Korea, admiring the DPRK full of bright and cheerful laughing of children.
					
					 At that time only the south Korean "government" authorities committed unpardonable crimes again. Their slandering of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is a provocation which pushes the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 We positively support the just cause of the army and people of the DPRK to improve inter-Korean relations and ensure the regional peace and security.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in Japan Stage War Drill
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in Japan Stage War Drill
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. troops in Japan are hell-bent on military drills to round off their war posture.
					 The U.S. Marines in Okinawa staged a live shell firing drill at a drill ground of the Ground "Self-Defense Force" in Hokkaido recently.
					
					 The drill will reportedly last till June 25.

articles.title: Over 5 000 Rally against Deployment of Ospreys in Okinawa
articles.content:
Over 5 000 Rally against Deployment of Ospreys in Okinawa
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Around 5 200 people rallied Sunday in Japan's southernmost prefecture of Okinawa against the planned deployment of MV-22 Osprey transport aircraft in Naha City of the prefecture later this year, according to Kyodo News of Japan.
					 Local officials and residents are strongly opposed to the deployment, given the plane's noise and history of fatal crashes during test flights.

articles.title: FDRP publica memorandum sobre sancion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
FDRP publica memorandum sobre sancion anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) hizo publico el dia 20 un memorandum para denunciar el caracter siniestro y sucio de la campana de sancion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que arman Estados Unidos y sus satelites.
					Abajo se transmite el texto resumido:
					
					El imperialismo norteamericano provoco el 25 de junio de 1950 la guerra coreana y definio a Corea el 17 de diciembre del mismo ano como "pais enemigo que amenaza la seguridad de EE.UU.".
					
					Desde entonces, comenzo a romper, en virtud del "ley de comercio exterior con los paises enemigos", todas las relaciones economicas con la RPDC, especificamente, la congelacion de propiedades y el cese del comercio, inversiones, transacciones financieras y mensajeria.
					
					En la decada de 1960, segun la llamada "ley de ayuda al extranjero", prohibio totalmente los negocios con Corea tanto del nivel gubernamental como del empresarial y bancario. 
					
					En las decadas de 1970 y 1980, aplicando la "ley de comercio", "ley de medidas de emergencia para la economia exterior", "ley del banco de exportacion e importacion" y otras, amplio el perimetro de la sancion contra la RPDC en el comercio exterior, la inversion, el seguro, el credito, el prestamo, el alquiler y las demas esferas economicas.
					
					El 20 de enero de 1988, al incluir absurdamente a la RPDC en la lista de los "paises que patrocinan el terrorismo", activo contra ella todos los codigos de sancion, inclusive "ley de administracion de exportacion", "ley de ayuda al extranjero", "ley de control de exportacion de armas" y "ley de instituciones financieras internacionales".
					
					Suspendio finalmente la construccion de la central de reactores de agua ligera, que debe suministrar a la RPDC segun el Acuerdo Basico RPDC-EE.UU. firmado en Ginebra en octubre de 1994, lo cual causo enormes perdidas a la industria coreana de energia nuclear.
					
					El imperio y sus seguidores fabricaron en 2006 y 2009 en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU las resoluciones no.1718 y no.1874 para sancionar a la RPDC en la palestra internacional acusandola de prueba nuclear realizada para la autodefensa y de lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos.
					
					Al volver a cuestionar en abril del ano en curso el lanzamiento de satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong no.3" de la RPDC, ellos instigaron a publicar en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la declaracion presidencial de "condena" y abogaron por las medidas adicionales de sancion.
					
					La sancion no ataca solamente el sector militar de la RPDC sino casi todas las esferas civiles como los materiales necesarios a la vida del pueblo, los equipos y tecnologias de punta para las fabricas importantes.
					
					A traves de la fabricacion de la ley nacional y la resolucion de la ONU, EE.UU. toma las medidas punitivas tales como la congelacion de propiedades de la RPDC, la suspension de la ayuda, el negocio y la asistencia financieros, la prohibicion de contratos de prestamo, el registro de barcos coreanos sospechosos en alta mar, la confiscacion de los materiales prohibidos y el control de importacion y exportacion de todas las armas y los materiales relacionados.
					
					Llegan a cientos las leyes de sancion y las medidas de igual indole que el imperio aplica a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites aplican la sancion doble y triple a la RPDC segun el "Acuerdo de Wassenaar sobre el control de la exportacion de armas convencionales, mercancias y tecnologias de doble uso".
					
					Por ejemplo, en 2009, EE.UU. ejercio presion sobre un pais para que no exporte a la RPDC el vanadio diciendo que esto puede usarse en la produccion de misiles.
					
					Ahora las materias y las tecnologias prohibidas por EE.UU. alcanzan a miles de generos, a saber, los equipos de industria quimica, las materias primas de cosmeticos, los camiones de caja larga. 
					
					Aduce que esos materiales pueden tener doble uso como la fabricacion de armas quimicas y el transporte o el lanzamiento de misiles.
					
					Condicionando la ayuda humanitaria con la "renuncia nuclear" y la "transparencia", insiste en suministrar cada mes a la RPDC poca cantidad de meriendas y productos nutritivos para que no puedan usarse como alimentos de los militares.
					
					La banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak se incorpora mas que nadie a la campana de sancion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					La horda de Lee frustro unilateralmente en julio de 2008 el turismo al monte Kumgang que se realizaba durante casi 10 anos y llevo a la peor crisis la gestion de la zona industrial de Kaesong.
					
					Actuo freneticamente en el CS de la ONU para fabricar la resolucion de sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					Incurre en todas las maniobras sucias para que otros paises no inviertan en la RPDC ni la ayuden como gesto humanitario ni negocien con ella.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana piensan que podrian quebrar la fe, la voluntad y la unidad monolitica del pueblo coreano con la campana de sancion.
					
					Ninguna campana de sancion o presion podra impedir los pasos firmes de la RPDC que avanza por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak - perturbador no.1 de la situacion: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak - perturbador no.1 de la situacion: comentario de ACNC
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- La banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak de reconocida tendencia pronorteamericana crea nuevamente la crisis de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana con sus aventureras provocaciones militares.
					Insatisfecha de haber llevado a la peor fase las relaciones intercoreanas mediante su campana en busca de enfrentamiento de regimenes del Norte y el Sur de Corea y sus acciones inmorales, toma parte activa ahora en los preparativos de Estados Unidos para la nueva guerra de agresion.
					
					Insistiendo obstinadamente en la "provocacion adicional del Norte" junto con su amo gringo, compra en grandes cantidades nuevos equipos y armamentos letales como cazas, misiles y proyectiles de perdigones, hechos en EE.UU.
					
					Ademas, esta revisando y perfeccionando su capacidad de combate para poner en practica el plan de EE.UU. sobre el ataque preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En las zonas litorales del Mar Este de Corea, realizo los "ejercicios de chequeo de la disposicion frente a la provocacion local" suponiendo el "asalto de buques, la provocacion de artilleria y la infiltracion en los establecimientos importantes", etc. y desarrollo con EE.UU. los ejercicios aereos conjuntos de mayor envergadura en la historia.
					
					Abogando por el "castigo correspondiente" y el "ataque de precision", la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos libro la demostracion de fuego movilizando lanzacohetes reactivos en la primera linea del frente a menos de 10 kilometros desde la zona de la RPDC.
					
					En el mes en curso, los belicistas surcoreanos dan mas acicates a sus acciones militares.
					
					Tienen previsto desplegar desde el dia 18 hasta el 25 sucesivos entrenamientos militares, tales como "Hwarang 2012", los ejercicios navales combinados EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea, la maniobra naval EE.UU.-Sur de Corea en que participara hasta un portaaviones norteamericano.
					
					Todos los hechos comprueban que el traidor Lee es lacayo no.1 de EE.UU. y Japon que se puso al frente de las maniobras para aplastar a la RPDC y perturbar la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					La locura militar de los traidores surcoreanos hace recordar al abominable traidor Syngman Rhee, quien hace 62 anos, se habia ofrecido como brigada de choque en la pasada guerra coreana, desatada por EE.UU., reclamando el "avance al Norte (de Corea)".
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana, donde estan concentradas mas fuerzas armadas que en otras partes del mundo, inclusive las armas nucleares, y no hay ningun sistema o garantia de paz duradera, cualquier provocacion trivial se expandira en un instante como guerra nuclear total entre ambas partes y la regional.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana tendran que pensar con seriedad en las tremendas consecuencias que provengan de sus acciones para la provocacion de nueva guerra.

articles.title: Terminado torneo de escuelas deportivas de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Terminado torneo de escuelas deportivas de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la 49a competencia de las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					  En esta cita compitieron los jugadores de las escuelas deportivas de los municipios y distritos capitalinos.
					
					Ademas de definir a los campeones de este ano,  fueron seleccionados los jugadores que representaran a la ciudad de Pyongyang en la competencia de igual nombre de dimension nacional a inaugurarse en agosto proximo.
					
					  Los equipos favoritos de siempre sobresalieron en el levantamiento de pesas, judo (f), atletismo, boxeo, baloncesto (f), lucha y otras disciplinas.
					
					  Pero, se dieron resultados inesperados en otros deportes como el futbol que tuvo 4 clases por edades.
					
					  En las anteriores ediciones, salieron triunfadores los equipos de futbol del municipio de Rakrang.
					
					  Un ano, subieron a lo mas alto del podio 5 equipos de ese municipio centrando la atencion de especialistas y aficionados.
					
					  Este ano, en la clase de escuelas primarias, ocuparon el primer lugar los onces de ambos generos del municipio de Phyongchon.
					
					Ademas, 6 municipios (distritos) terminaron primeros en las 3 clases restantes de ambos sexos.
					
					  Las sorpresas se dieron tambien en el baloncesto y judo masculinos de juniores y el voleibol femenino.
					
					  Un funcionario del circulo deportivo dijo a la ACNC que la presente cita deportiva hizo constar el mejoramiento de nivel tecnico y fisico de los jugadores de reserva que se esfuerzan mucho por ganar las medallas de oro.
					
					  Los profesores-entrenadores y los jugadores de las escuelas clasificadas en la ocasion se preparan ahora para honrar a la ciudad de Pyongyang en la competencia nacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica al ministro de Defensa japones en tema de satellite
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica al ministro de Defensa japones en tema de satelite
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Sumandose a lo que insiste Estados Unidos, el ministro de Defensa de Japon, Morimoto, cuestiono el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendolo como "disparo de misil". 
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun difundio este miercoles un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Esas palabras, que invierten la verdad, parten del objetivo de justificar la participacion activa de Japon en el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles patrocinado por EE.UU. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses producen y despliegan muchos misiles modernos por una parte y por la otra, cuestionan el lanzamiento de satelite artificial coreano con fines pacificos para encubrir su atributo agresivo. 
					
					El "lanzamiento de misil" es un sofisma de los politiqueros japoneses que tienen hasta en sus tuetanos la hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Por mucho que ellos hablen de "lanzamiento de misil" por parte de la RPDC para sus fines militaristas, no tendran otro resultado que mostrar su fachada de provocadores que amenazan la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico.
